channel.title: Art on darkvolumes
channel.description: Recent content in Art on darkvolumes

item.title: Antiques - Unique Pieces
item.description: Antiques - Unique Pieces Brafa 2022 Skeleton of an Ice Age woolly rhinoceros The fossil was entrusted to the Royal Belgian Institute of Natural Sciences in Brussels. Medusa pendant This masterpiece, created by Philippe Wolfers, is internationally recognized as an icon of Art Noveau jewellery. The pendant will be preserved in the Brussel Museum of Art and History. Art Noveau-style pedestal, made from bronze and fossilised wood Victor Horta designed this piece for the winter garden of his house.

item.title: Design Chairs
item.description: Design Chairs A selection of design chairs, by chronological order. 1925 Gerrit Rietveld - Red and Blue Chair 1925 Marcel Breuer - Wassily Chair 1928 Le Corbusier - Chaise Longue 1948 Charles and Ray Eames - La Chaise 1956 Nelson - Marshmallow Sofa 1957 Arne Jacobsen - Drop Egg and Swan 1963-65 Eero Aarnio - Globe Chair 1972 Frank Gehry - Wiggle Side Chair 1975 Alessandro Mendini - Grano 1985 Marc Newson - Lockheed Lounge
